LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon.label: Huge Weapon Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon.description: This weapon organ is extremely large and can only be used by large Arachne Broodlords with a body size over 2.0.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Acid.label: Arachne Acid
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Acid.description: When this weapon organ's projectile hits an enemy, it leaves acid on the target's surface, inflicting continuous damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Toxid.label: Arachne Toxin
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Toxid.description: When this weapon organ's projectile hits an enemy, it injects toxins into the target's body, causing an intoxicated state.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Spawn.label: Arachne Sub-Nest
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Spawn.description: The main attack method of this weapon organ is the release of sub-insects; some are directly projected into enemy lines, and others track and adhere to the enemy to inflict damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_ChainReload.label: Chain Reload
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_ChainReload.description: Each attack from this weapon organ releases hormones to increase metabolic speed, resulting in increased firing rate and reloading speed.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_OverPenetrate.label: Over Penetration
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_OverPenetrate.description: This weapon organ's projectile does not stop upon hitting an enemy, instead it penetrates all enemies along its path, inflicting damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_LightingChain.label: Psychic Lightning Chain
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_LightingChain.descript: This weapon organ fires a lightning chain that bounces between enemies, inflicting damage.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Icez.label: Rapid Cooling Fracture
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Icez.description: This weapon organ freezes enemies. This state makes the target's body structure extremely vulnerable. As the effect deepens, the "freezing" damage threshold required to destroy body parts is significantly lowered.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_FrostExplode.label: Freezing Explosion
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_FrostExplode.descripti: The frost mist fired by this weapon organ adheres to enemies, and the adhered enemies subsequently explode.
